#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

= Pre-Requset =

1 install ros

{{{
wget 'https://sourceforge.net/p/jsk-ros-pkg/code/HEAD/tree/trunk/jsk.rosbuild?format=raw' -O /tmp/jsk.rosbuild
yes | bash /tmp/jsk.rosbuild groovy
cd ~/ros/groovy
source setup.bash
rosws merge http://rtm-ros-robotics.googlecode.com/svn/tags/latest/agentsystem_ros_tutorials/rtm-ros-robotics.rosinstall -ry
rosws update
}}}

2. environment setup
{{{
echo "source ~/ros/groovy/setup.bash" >> ~/.bashrc
source ~/.bashrc
}}}

= Usage =

1. roslaunch move_base_stage_tutorial robot.launch

   (furteのユーザは，rosrun rviz rviz -d \`rospack find move_base_stage_tutorial\`/config/rviz.vcg とすること)


   see http://www.ros.org/wiki/navigation/Tutorials/Using%20rviz%20with%20the%20Navigation%20Stack for how to use rviz
  

2. roslaunch rosnode_rtc stage_sample.launch

Launch this configuration file and confirm the bridge node is Activated

https://rtm-ros-robotics.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/rtmros_common/rosnode_rtc/sample/image/rosnode-rtc-sysedit.png


3. rosrun rosnode_rtc stage_sample_send_goal.sh

Send navigation target pose to /move_base_simple/goal topic from RT-Component
台車が動けば成功です
